title: akitu - font ID - hybrid
content:
I know this looks quite custom, but I was wondering if anybody recognized what this font might have been based off of originally?

Many thanks in advance for any help!  
Danny

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150220005617im_/http:/typophile.com/files/1%20copy_4248.jpg)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [1 copy.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150220005617/http:/typophile.com/files/1%20copy.jpg) | 25.26 KB |
author: Danny_Miller

comments.content:
Bauer Bodoni (bold or black) seems to have the right proportions:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/bauer-bodoni/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150220005617/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/bauer-bodoni/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/bauer-bodoni/")

EDIT: See the working drawing here:  
 [http://inhousedesign.co.nz/project/akitu/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150220005617/http:/inhousedesign.co.nz/project/akitu/ "http://inhousedesign.co.nz/project/akitu/")

Or Commercial Type's companion typeface, Dala Moa:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150220005617im_/http:/typophile.com/files/DalaMoa_5463.png)
